titleStmt.title: Information for the Earl of Roxburgh, and Mr. William Ker his brother, against John Lord Ballenden.
titleStmt.author: Roxburghe, Robert, Earl of, d. 1696.
Roxburghe, John Ker, Duke of, ca. 1680-1741.
Ker, William, d. 1741.

notesStmt.note: Legal dispute between the immediate family of the Earl of Roxburghe and a cousin, Lord Bellenden, about the entail on the Bellenden estates.
Earl of Roxburghe referred to either Robert, 4th Earl or John Ker, 5th Earl and 1st Duke.
Imperfect: stained with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
